extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate External Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if each external connection is truly needed and assess the necessity of publicly available information about the systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Assume System Targeting
extracted_playbook.description: Operate under the assumption that the system is being targeted and predict the effects a malicious actor would intend to cause.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply ICS Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement straightforward ICS security best practices to counter adversary TTPs.
